Articles.Content:
Hello

My problem is that my RCS thruster icons turn black and don't work, when I try to use them. It's only with my rocket to test docking with my space station.

Here's the screenshot:

Sorry everyone. I fixed it. The game bugged and thought that the RCS tanks were just parts with no function ((o_o)) I replaced them, and now, it worked =D

Edited August 15, 2012 by Hermitao

Moderator comment: Thread moved to 'how to'

helpfully user comment:

Welcome aboard, the issue here seems to be that you have not put on any RCS fuel tanks, as they do not run on rocket fuel, but there own source.

If you have not added any mod parts etc.. the RCS fuel tank should be the small tank at the bottom right side of the propulsion tab, it has two yellow strips running around it!
Sorry but... the RCS tanks are there... '-' Look at them, under the Advanced S.A.S. module. Sorry for the double thread: thought that one didn't go.
Ekhm... He DID added RCS tanks. Look where he put that horizontal fuel tank

Ekhm... He DID added RCS tanks. Look where he put that horizontal fuel tank

Well I will be, couldn't see them for the life of me..
Try posting the craft file so we can see what the problem is.
